name: The Gramo Phone
description: The Gramo Phone is a golem technology. First designed by an order of techmonks in the foothills of the Himalayas, the Gramo Phone soon took on a life of its own spawning future technology from its case like a deformed limb. When played, it alters the universal vibration, effecting the metasphere, warping time and space. This is my first NFT attached to a steampunk universe I'm developing for an upcoming writing project. The Gramo Phone is the first NFT in an upcoming collection.
